Articles.Content:
Namaste, Kerbal Space Forums; I am Narstrom.

I have been lurking around the ship yards for a little while, finding interesting little ships here and there, and now I have decided it would be fun to join!

I dont really know what to type,(I'm not sure if I should say anything about my person, really) because I don't know this community this well, but I'm hoping it's friendly; Anyway, I got into the KSP with the .13 demo and thought it was quite fun, though not a single time did I get out of orbit; (To my chagrin) My favorite ships are the Demv Mk5 and it's orbital delivery system, and the wonderful planes that can be built with Firespitter , Please bear in mind that my internet is very spotty and so the computer that I own that has KSp is stuck on .19; but no worrys, I'm managing.

Thank you all so very much for reading this, I hope I can prosper in this community
Thank you so much! How do I set my own avatar?

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Wait! Sorry for double posting, Your the one who made HArdly Rocket Science?! :DD Jii this is awesome!

Welcome to the community, man. This is by far and away the nicest gaming community I've ever been a part of, so don't worry! You'll like it here. If you ever need anything, chances are it's been posted in the forums at some point, and you just have to do some searching. If not, feel free to post anything, and someone will help you out. This forum has never failed me, and I've been playing since 0.13.

Best of luck to you in your maiden launches, and once again, welcome to the forums.

P.S. If you want to make insignia for your achievements (like I have in my signature) or flags for your missions, click on the one in my signature for a direct link to the website.

How do I set my own avatar?

I believe you have to have a certain amount of posts before certain profile changes can be made. I think at 5 posts, your profile editing opens up, but I'm not 100% sure on that. Maybe someone else can confirm this for me *cough* someone help me confirm it *cough*
I'll have to get to five posts, Thanks. Also, you were wrong about me in your post :3, just saying
